column4: Does anyone know of a good music player for ubuntu, Rythmbox and I don't get along very well
Is it more common to download new programs for ubuntu with the terminal or to download something off my web browser
it is most common (and sane) to just use the repositories (meaning either Synaptic or apt-get, normally)

main is free software maintained by the core developers of Ubuntu; "universe" is free software maintained by the community; "restricted" is non-free software by the core devs; "multiverse" is non-free by the community
